headline: Is Workday’s (WDAY) Canada AI Bet Quietly Rewiring Its Long‑Term Recruiting Advantage?
summary: In January 2026, Joveo announced a Workday Design Approved integration for its AI-driven programmatic job advertising platform, while Workday outlined plans to invest C$1.00 billion over five years to deepen its Canadian tech talent base and customer support footprint. Together, these moves highlight how Workday is leaning on AI partnerships and regional expansion to enhance its recruiting ecosystem and strengthen its role in data-rich hiring workflows. Next, we will examine how Workday’s...
